kpi.name: M8013C27

kpi_info.title: Signaling Connection Establishment failures for emergency calls due to missing RB resources
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment failures for emergency calls due to missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources UPDATED: Transmission of the RRC: RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) because of missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRC: RRCConnectionRequest message (eNB <- UE) with EstablishmentCause set to emergency (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi.kpi_alias: Signaling Connection Establishment failures for emergency calls due to missing RB resources
